SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_DEPL_PKG_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Deployment Package Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DEPL_PKG_DIR# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Deployment Package Name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DEPL_PKG_FILENAME#
:SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PACKAGE_FILENAME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DEPL_PKG_DIR#\&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DEPL_PKG_FILENAME#
! Start execution :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN
:SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR# = "&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#\temp&$RUNID#" :PUBLISH &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR#, , "TOP"
! Create extracted directory New-Item -Path "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR#" -Force -ItemType directory :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL
! Extract deployment package to temp directory :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Start extracting file to &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR#..." :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO
:SET &UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_NAME# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PACKAGE_FILENAME# :SET &UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_TARGET# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.UNPACK :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL
! java -jar siebeltool.jar siebel UnarchiveFeature -s "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_PACKAGE_FILENAME#" -t "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR#" | Out-Default ! :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL
! Search zip file in folder collected_files $source_zip = "" ForEach($item in (Get-ChildItem -Path "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR#\collected_files" -Filter "*.zip")) { if ($item.Attributes -eq "Archive") { $source_zip = $item.FullName } }
if ($source_zip -ne "") { : SET &UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_NAME# = "$source_zip" : SET &UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_TARGET# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR#\collected_files\" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.UNPACK : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL }
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Extracted files successfully to &UC4RB_SIEBEL_EXTRACTED_DIR#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO
